org.jgentleframework.core.reflection
Interface IAnnotationVisitor

All Known Subinterfaces:
DefinitionManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDefinitionController, AbstractVisitorHandler, DefinitionManagerImpl
public interface IAnnotationVisitor

Provides some method in order to manage extension points in course interpret annotations or definitions.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com

Method Detail

addAnnotationBeanProcessor

<T extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> AnnotationBeanProcessor<?> addAnnotationBeanProcessor(java.lang.Class<T> key,
                                                                                                  AnnotationBeanProcessor<T> handler)
Registers an AnnotationBeanProcessor

Type Parameters:
T -
Parameters:
key - the object class of corresponding annotation need to be registered to given AnnotationBeanProcessor
handler - the given AnnotationBeanProcessor need to be registered.
Returns:
returns the previous registered AnnotationBeanProcessor if it exists, otherwise returns null.

addDefinitionPostProcessor

void addDefinitionPostProcessor(java.lang.Class<? extends DefinitionPostProcessor> dpp)
Registers a given DefinitionPostProcessor.

Note: if given DefinitionPostProcessor is existed, this method does not thing.

Parameters:
dpp - the object class of given DefinitionPostProcessor need to be registered.

addDefinitionPostProcessor

void addDefinitionPostProcessor(DefinitionPostProcessor dpp)
Registers a given DefinitionPostProcessor.

Note: if given DefinitionPostProcessor is existed, this method does not thing.

Parameters:
dpp - the given DefinitionPostProcessor instance need to be registered.

getDefinitionPostProcessor

DefinitionPostProcessor getDefinitionPostProcessor(int index)
Returns the DefinitionPostProcessor at the specified position.

Parameters:
index - index of the DefinitionPostProcessor to return.

removeAnnotationBeanProcessor

<T extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> AnnotationBeanProcessor<?> removeAnnotationBeanProcessor(java.lang.Class<T> key)
Removes the specififed AnnotationBeanProcessor.

Type Parameters:
T -
Parameters:
key - the annotation type of corresponding annotation of the specified AnnotationBeanProcessor need to be removed.
Returns:
returns the AnnotationBeanProcessor was removed, or returns null if no AnnotationBeanProcessor is removed.

removeDefinitionPostProcessor

boolean removeDefinitionPostProcessor(DefinitionPostProcessor dpp)
Removes the specified DefinitionPostProcessor

Parameters:
dpp - the specified DefinitionPostProcessor need to be removed.
Returns:
returns true if success, false otherwise.

removeDefinitionPostProcessor

DefinitionPostProcessor removeDefinitionPostProcessor(int index)
Removes the specified DefinitionPostProcessor at the specified position.

Parameters:
index - the index of DefinitionPostProcessor to remove.
Returns:
returns the specified DefinitionPostProcessor was removed.
